input.content:
Return only a single valid JSON object. Do not include any prose or Markdown fences. The object must be strictly valid JSON.

Find 3 recent breakthroughs in battery technology and return a compact JSON summary.

action.query: KAIST LG Energy Solution lithium metal Nature Energy 2025 'cohesion-inhibiting' electrolyte Sept 2025 'Nature Energy' 'KAIST' 'LG'

annotations.title: Toyota, Sumitomo Metal make advances in cathode materials for solid-state batteries
China's CATL launches new sodium-ion battery brand
Lithium-metal batteries can charge in 12 minutes for an 800 km drive

content.text: {"breakthroughs":[{"id":"B1","title":"Durable cathode materials for all-solid-state batteries","date":"2025-10-08","summary":"Toyota and Sumitomo Metal reported development of a highly durable cathode powder/process that addresses degradation in all-solid-state EV batteries, advancing safety, cycle life and manufacturability toward practical vehicle use.","impact":"Improves durability and manufacturability of solid-state cells — shortens path to automotive deployment and higher energy density/safety than conventional li-ion.","maturity":"Industrial development / pre-commercial (partners target vehicle integration and mass production steps by 2027–2028).","organizations":["Toyota Motor Corporation","Sumitomo Metal Mining Co., Ltd.","Idemitsu Kosan (collaboration)"],"sources":["([reuters.com](https://www.reuters.com/business/autos-transportation/toyota-sumitomo-metal-make-advances-cathode-materials-solid-state-batteries-2025-10-08/?utm_source=openai))"]},{"id":"B2","title":"Second-generation sodium‑ion (Naxtra) & commercialization push","date":"2025-04-21","summary":"CATL launched its Naxtra sodium‑ion battery brand (second‑generation sodium chemistry) and announced plans for mass production beginning late‑2025, offering ~175 Wh/kg energy density with fast‑charge capability and lower cost/resource risk than lithium chemistries.","impact":"Accelerates commercialization of sodium‑ion for EVs and grid/storage — reduces lithium dependency and cost, enables safer lower‑cost packs for certain vehicle segments and stationary storage.","maturity":"Commercial rollout / scale-up (mass production planned starting Dec 2025; design-ins announced for multiple EV models).","organizations":["CATL (Contemporary Amperex Technology Co. Ltd.)"],"sources":["([reuters.com](https://www.reuters.com/technology/chinese-battery-maker-catl-launches-second-generation-fast-charging-battery-2025-04-21/?utm_source=openai))"]},{"id":"B3","title":"Cohesion‑inhibiting electrolyte enabling fast‑charging lithium‑metal cells","date":"2025-09-04","summary":"A KAIST–LG Energy Solution team published results for a novel liquid electrolyte (anion design that weakly binds Li+) that suppresses dendrite formation, demonstrating lithium‑metal cells charging to ~70% in ~12 minutes over hundreds of cycles and projected energy densities ~380–386 Wh/kg.","impact":"Addresses the key safety/lifespan barrier for lithium‑metal anodes — potential to substantially increase EV range, cut charging time, and raise energy density vs. conventional li‑ion cells if scaled and validated in automotive packs.","maturity":"Laboratory → advanced prototype (peer‑reviewed publication; industry partner LGES pursuing next development steps).","organizations":["Korea Advanced Institute of Science and Technology (KAIST)","LG Energy Solution"],"sources":["([techxplore.com](https://techxplore.com/news/2025-09-lithium-metal-batteries-minutes-km.html?utm_source=openai))"]}]}
